item.title: Politico Stealth Edits Error-Filled Hit Piece On GOP Spending Bill

item.title: If The Supreme Court Is Going To Ignore The Constitution, Trump Should Ignore The Supreme Court
item.description: Lower courts don’t have authority to usurp the executive branch through restraining orders and injunctions, no matter what the SCOTUS says.
